title: Woman's Unofficial Informal Vest
description: Sleeveless vest of medium blue k\'ossu with sprays of plum blossom in red, pink, green, and purple.  Border of black k\'ossu with same design, bound all around with green satin.  On the bottom a long-tassled fringe in rust, yellow, pink, and green.  Lining of blue-figured silk.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
